78395.summary: Some customers in the Harbour Village area of Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
78395.title: June 14 - Coquitlam (Harbour Village) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

78390.summary: Some customers in the Glengarry area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
78390.title: June 14 - Calgary (Glengarry) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
